name: Unreal Tournament (1999)
notes:
Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above). 
If you have graphical issues, try changing the renderer to Direct3D from the settings in-game or by deleting UnrealTournament.ini in the game's System folder, to reset to the default configuration.

files.game:
N/A:Select the game's installer. Download it here: 
https://www.gog.com/downlink/unreal_tournament_goty/en1installer0

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament GOTY/System/UnrealTournament.exe
files:
- game: "N/A:Select the game's installer. Download it here: \nhttps://www.gog.com/downlink/unreal_tournament_goty/en1installer0"
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament GOTY/System/UnrealTournament.ini
    key: GameRenderDevice
    section: Engine.Engine
    value: OpenGLDrv.OpenGLRenderDevice
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament GOTY/System/UnrealTournament.ini
    key: FirstRun
    section: FirstRun
    value: 436
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament GOTY/System/UnrealTournament.ini
    key: FullscreenViewportX
    section: WinDrv.WindowsClient
    value: 4000
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament GOTY/System/UnrealTournament.ini
    key: FullscreenViewportY
    section: WinDrv.WindowsClient
    value: 3000
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Tournament GOTY/System/UnrealTournament.ini
    key: FullscreenColorBits
    section: WinDrv.WindowsClient
    value: 32
